How does BMW’s tech-fest i8 stack up as
a true sports car?

20.text:
We’ve compared it on road and track to the
Porsche 911 and Audi R8 in the magazine, but

25.text:
here we’re purely to find out if it can
live with a 911 in a straight line.

electric motor combine to give a total of
